Race.FullText: Shall the Livingston Parish Mosquito Abatement District, Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy and collect a three (3) mill tax on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $1,267,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning in the year 2014 and ending in the year 2023, for the purpose of paying costs of mosquito abatement programs for the citizens of Livingston Parish through the Livingston Parish Mosquito Abatement District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 4 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 20 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 4 of Livingston Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), renew and extend the levy of a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $1,700,000.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of twenty (20) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2034, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection and emergency medical service facilities, vehicles and equipment, including both movable and immovable property, and to pay the costs of obtaining water for fire hydrant purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and services?
